description: In the game of pool, someone's got to rack the balls before the game can get started. In this case, Patrick Rouge will be racking, or more like licking and sucking, Cody's balls.After they finish up their game of pool, these two head into the living room where Cody has some after game porn playing in the DVD player. Since Patrick lost, he needs to get on his knees and services his studly buddy.After much licking, sucking and rimming, Patrick blows his load followed by Cody getting off as well.Enjoy!
title: Licking, sucking & rimming
